#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t; cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,temp,c2=0,c3=0,c5=0; cin>>n;
		while(n>=2)
		{
			temp=n;
			if(temp%2==0)
			{
				 while(temp)
				{
					if(temp%2==0)c2++;
					else break; temp/=2;
				}
			}
			temp=n;
			if(temp%3==0)
			{
				 while(temp)
				{
					if(temp%3==0)c3++;
					else break; temp/=3;
				}
			}
						temp=n;
			if(temp%5==0)
			{
				 while(temp)
				{
					if(temp%5==0)c5++;
					else break; temp/=5;
				}
			}
			n--;
		}
		cout<<c2<<endl<<c3<<endl<<c5<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
